DocAttribute.Name: FillStyles
DocAttribute.Documentation: The set of fill area styles to use in presenting visible curve segments, annotation fill areas or surfaces.

DocAttribute.Name: ModelorDraughting

DocWhereRule.Name: MaxOneColour
DocWhereRule.Documentation: There shall be a maximum of one colour assignment to the fill area style.

DocWhereRule.Name: MaxOneExtHatchStyle
DocWhereRule.Documentation: There shall be a maximum of one externally defined hatch style assignment to the fill area style.

DocWhereRule.Name: ConsistentHatchStyleDef
DocWhereRule.Documentation: Either the fill area style contains a definition from an externally defined hatch style, or from (one or many) fill area style hatchings or from (one or many) fill area style tiles, but not a combination of those three types.
